title: Path to Paris: The Hunt for Gold
overview: This two-part series follows British athletes as they prepare for the most prestigious event in sport – the Paris 2024 Olympics and Paralympics Games. With intimate access to their training and home lives, we'll see how the athletes, supported by coaches, parents, loved ones and backed by National Lottery funding, have invested everything to get to the start line in Paris this summer. With unique insights into the mental and physical preparations, we share in every triumph and setback on the ‘Road To Paris'. Featured athletes include Keely Hodgkinson, Josh Kerr, Jonnie Peacock and Hannah Cockroft.
